players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to gather more information."
You: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events last night. Let's all try to be more open and share any information we might have, no matter how insignificant it may seem."
Diana: "Let's all try to be more open and share any information we might have, no matter how insignificant it may seem."

Charlie: "I agree with Alice that we should all share any information we have, no matter how insignificant it may seem. I also want to remind everyone that Diana was found to be the mafioso during the night investigation."
